org.nodex.java.core

Class SimpleAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nodex.java.core.SimpleFuture<T>
      • org.nodex.java.core.DeferredAction<T>
        • org.nodex.java.core.SynchronousAction<java.lang.Void>
          • org.nodex.java.core.SimpleAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deferred<java.lang.Void>, Future<java.lang.Void>

    public abstract class SimpleAction
extends SynchronousAction<java.lang.Void>

    An Implementation of Deferred which can be used to implement custom synchronous actions.

    If you wish to create an instance of Deferred which does an operation without returning sa result, without blocking than this class can be subclassed and the act method implemented.

    Author:
    Tim Fox
